title: Title
hero_description: Have you ever wondered where you can go with your dog without worry? We're here to make it easy for you! 'Where with the Dog' is a platform born out of love for pets and the desire to enjoy their company anywhere – be it a restaurant, café, or hotel.
intro: We want to introduce you to the site 'Where with the Dog'
description: The site allows pet owners to easily search for places where they can go with their pets.
choose_place: Where do you want to go?
small_puppies: Small dogs and puppies of larger breeds up to 5 months
spots_error404: Unfortunately, there is no pet-friendly establishment in our database that matches your search.
site_info: The site was created by the owner of two dogs and a cat, aiming to help pet owners check if their pets are welcome in certain places.
suggest_instructions: Clicking the 'Suggest' button opens a form to input details.
note: The information is based on personal experience; categories may change.
rule_1: Dogs must be under constant owner supervision.
rule_2: Owners are responsible for any damage caused by their dog.
rule_3: Aggressive dogs must leave the park.
rule_4: Dogs must be healthy, microchipped, and vaccinated.
rule_6: Do not bring food (except for dog treats), glass, or hazardous items.
rule_7: Dogs must be leashed upon entry and exit.
rule_10: Pregnant, sick, or injured dogs are not allowed.
rule_11: The park is for visitors who follow the rules.
rule_12: Do not bring unvaccinated puppies under 4 months.
rule_13: Clean up after your dog and dispose of all waste.
hero_title: 'Where with the Dog?' - A place where your pets are welcome!
free_add: Add new spots for free and help the community
pet_welcome: Always know where your pet is truly welcome!
random_spot_description: 'Where with the Dog' is your ultimate resource for discovering pet-friendly destinations. Whether you're looking for the perfect park or pet-friendly venues, we connect you to places that embrace your furry friends. Our platform offers detailed reviews, interactive maps, and a vibrant community hub where pet lovers can share tips and heartwarming stories. Plan your next adventure confidently, knowing that you and your pet are always welcome!
